content.title: Telos Core Flow
content.summary: Structured walkthrough of the Beat → ReAct → Archive pipeline using mock data.

sections.heading: Inbox Preparation
body: Install the baseline fixtures to populate inbox intents and configuration files.
Confirm environment variables HI_APP_ROOT and HI_SERVER_BIND are exported before starting the server.

children.heading: Checklist
body: Inspect data/intent/inbox for the seed markdown intent.

sections.heading: Processing
body: Call POST /api/intents to enqueue a new request and trigger Beat scheduling.
Observe the orchestrator logs for THINK/ACT/OBSERVE traces to mirror the production flow.

children.heading: Outputs
body: Open data/journals/YYYY/MM/DD.md to validate rendered reasoning steps.
